articles.description: Kumar Sangakkara's epic reply on ICC's tribute post for MS Dhoni on his birthday is winning the internet.
articles.content:
• Legendary cricketer MS Dhoni is celebrating his 40th birthday today
  • Kumar Sangakkara came up with an epic reply to correct ICC's tribute post for MS Dhoni
